sect2.title: Creating the /var/run/utmp, /var/log/wtmp and /var/log/btmp files
sect2.para: Programs like login, shutdown, uptime and others want to read from and write to the /var/run/utmp /var/log/btmp and /var/log/wtmp. These files contain information about who is currently logged in. It also contains information on when the computer was last booted and shutdown and a record of the bad login attempts.
